item.title: Edsger Dijkstraâ€™s One-Day Workweek
item.description: Link Dijkstra only went into university once a week to discuss ideas, and yet was able to produce high volume of academic reports during the tenure.

item.title: How To Get Started - The Cult of Done
item.description: Introduced to the concept by No Boilerplate, who frames it with his own perspective and presents it very well ( link).

item.title: Jony Ivy - The Man behind Apple Design
item.description: YouTube Link Steve Jobs and John allowed design teams to butt heads and have more of a leading role in product design, which required engineering teams to accommodate and compromise, for design goals.

item.title: Shit rentals and the value of a social media following
item.description: A friend shared an article recently that detailed how “Tiktoker” Jodie van den Berg, had launched a database website that allowed previous renters of “shit rentals” to share their experience for future tenants.
